chapter.text: aejabu l'ilf qrysh, wamnhm, wastqamt msalhhm, wantzam rhltyhm fi alshita' 'iilaa "alymn", wafi alsayf 'iilaa "alsham", wtysyr dhlk; lijalb ma yhtajwn 'ilyh
aejabu l'ilf qrysh, wamnhm, wastqamt msalhhm, wantzam rhltyhm fi alshita' 'iilaa "alymn", wafi alsayf 'iilaa "alsham", wtysyr dhlk; lijalb ma yhtajwn 'ilyh
flyshkru, wlyebdu rabi hdha albayt -whw alkebt- aldhy shrfu bh, wlywhdwh wykhlsu lah alebadt
aldhy 'ateamahum min jue shdyd, wamanahum min fuzie wkhwf ezym
